data.title: Kris Jenner Says She’ll ‘Maybe’ Get Married to Corey Gamble ‘When I’m 70' — and Already Has 2 Brides
data.meta_description: Kris Jenner, the matriarch of the Kardashian-Jenner clan, has playfully hinted at the possibility of marrying her long-time partner Corey Gamble in the future. The 68-year-old momager, who turns 69…
data.text:
Kris Jenner, the matriarch of the Kardashian-Jenner clan, has playfully hinted at the possibility of marrying her long-time partner Corey Gamble in the future. The 68-year-old momager, who turns 69 in November, made these lighthearted comments during a recent episode of “The Kardashians,” suggesting that she might tie the knot when she reaches 70.

During a shopping trip in Beverly Hills with friends Faye Resnick and Kathy Hilton, Kris opened up about her upcoming hysterectomy surgery. The conversation took an unexpected turn when Kathy Hilton jokingly expressed disappointment that Kris wasn’t announcing her marriage. In response, Kris laughed and clarified, “I mean, not right this very second!”

The exchange continued with Kris playfully suggesting that her friends could be bridesmaids when she does get married, adding, “So maybe when I’m 70!” This comment has sparked interest among fans and media alike, as it’s one of the rare occasions where Kris has publicly addressed the possibility of marrying Gamble.

Kris and Corey, who is 43, have been in a relationship since August 2014. They first met at fashion designer Riccardo Tisci’s…
